Posts.Content: Hi I've been told to take them throughout the day but I may ask at my next appointment whether I can take them AM instead. Best Sarah
Posts.Title: Nozinan tablets for nausea after chemo

Posts.Content: I'm given  it in a syringe driver form. Makes me feel very washed out.   I find it hard to sleep after chemo because of the steroids. Best wishes Sarah
Posts.Title: Nozinan tablets for nausea after chemo

Posts.Content: Hi I was diagnosed October 2012 with Grade 3 IDC. Massive, massive shock. When I came round from my op for MX my first question was had the surgeon removed any lymph nodes and of course the answer was yes. I fell into a deep depression at this news. 15 out of 19 involved. Scans were clear though. Started FEC-T in November and just completed the third FEC and now onto the delights of T. I am 47 and live in North West Norfolk and am being treated in King's Lynn and will have radiotherapy in Cambridge. All best wishes Sarah
Posts.Title: Invasive Lobular Carcinoma with 23/24 lymph node involvement
